text: Ashok Kumar Rana is a veteran Indian politician from Western Uttar Pradesh, associated with the Bharatiya Janata Party. He is a member of Seventeenth Legislative Assembly of Uttar Pradesh representing the Dhampur assembly constituency. He is a two time M.L.A from Dhampur and one time MLA from Seohara. ==Political career== Ashok Kumar Rana has been a member of the 10th, 15th and 17th Legislative Assembly of Uttar Pradesh. Since 2017, he has represented the Dhampur (Assembly constituency) and is a member of the Bhartiya Janata Party. He defeated [Samajwadi Party] candidate Mool Chand Chauhan by a margin of 17,864 votes. ==Posts held== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! # !! From !! To !! Position !!
